articleTitles.title: Ex-Posen mayor pleads guilty to embezzling village funds

8.openFeedback: The charges haven't been proven so "ill-gotten" seems like a premature judgement, but even if it's accurate, claiming that the funds were stolen simply to gamble is an over-simplification. There may be many reason why theft occurred. The idea that gambling was the sole reason why the theft allegedly occurred came from the prosecutor, but the reader is likely to think this is more of a "fact" than an allegation.

8.title: Ex-Posen mayor pleads guilty to embezzling village funds
